data.text: @BradPitt_Tweets @mercnews The important part of divorce is don't let it affect the kids keep it quite it's been one big media revelation to be honest not news at all it should be a strictly private matter and making it headline news is little more than stiring things up Brad has had a raw deal not right

@BradPitt_Tweets @mercnews It's the media they have a certain way of making things up as they go along been rumbled by us Scots in 2014 never ending make up a news story sigh I don't buy rag papers any more
@BradPitt_Tweets @mercnews If this is the reason for the “truce”, the reason itself is unpopular. The reason should be to forgive and forget for the sake and wellbeing of their kids.
@BradPitt_Tweets This too shall pass for all parties involved. Divorce is often ugly. People can be petty but People forget.
@BradPitt_Tweets @mercnews And yes, she does appear to be masterly manipulative most of the time.
@BradPitt_Tweets @mercnews Seems a bit insincere to speak on a “truce” to regain your fans and friends. Aren’t the children’s well-being and their respect of their mother most important? Hmmmm...?
